snippet: As a senator, Barack Obama was a critic of the Bush administration,  saying it cast a “false choice” between liberty and security. As he engages in his own surveillance efforts, he has spoken of finding a balance.
lead_paragraph: As a senator, Barack Obama was a critic of the Bush administration,  saying it cast a “false choice” between liberty and security. As he engages in his own surveillance efforts, he has spoken of finding a balance.

headline.main: Obama on Surveillance, Then and Now

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
